dcterms:description: The KiTS dataset comprises 210 abdominal CT scans used for kidney tumor segmentation, with a 168:42 split for training and testing.
dcterms:title: KiTS (Kidney Tumor Segmentation)

dcterms:creator: Gabriel Chartrand
dcterms:description: The LiTS dataset consists of 201 CT scans used for liver tumor segmentation, with a 131:70 split for training and testing.
dcterms:title: LiTS (Liver Tumor Segmentation)
